column3: Latest; Kandal Province: Two active thieves were detained by local police after a mob attacked them for attempting to steal a motorcycle in front of a house. The incident happened on February 8
column4: 2019 at 08:15 am at Prek Khs village
column6: Kandal Province.------Four men attempted to steal a motorbike parked at the victim’s home. When challenged
column8: but angry locals caught up with the slower pair. After a sound beating
column10: patched them up and are preparing them for court.------ ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/785419.html
